response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to meet your specific needs and enhance your experience significantly. Given its value, I believe it's worth more than just the cost of production. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $110 for this exceptional product. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I trust you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 110}
